summary: A documentary that explores Bob Weirs life, through the Grateful Dead, Ratdog, and his childhood.
cast: John Perry Barlow|Chuck Berry|Neal Cassady|John Coltrane|Don Everly|Phil Everly|Carolyn Garcia|Jerry Garcia|Trixie Garcia|Mike Gordon|Sammy Hagar|Jerry Harrison|Mickey Hart|Bruce Hornsby|Blair Jackson|Ken Kesey|Bill Kreutzmann|Phil Lesh|Paul McCartney|Ron McKernan|Brent Mydland|Lee Ranaldo|Dan Rather|Tom Snyder|Bob Weir|Natascha Weir|Wendy Weir
title: The Other One: The Long, Strange Trip of Bob Weir
